title: Katmai National Park & Preserve: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     April 27, 2016  Tourism to Katmai National Park and Preserve Creates $83,062,677 in Economic Benefits  Visitor spending information for Katmai National Park and Preserve, and for National Parks across the U.S.   February 05, 2016  Public Hearing on Proposed Changes to 2016 Katmai Compendium  Katmai National Park and Preserve will host a public meeting and information session on Thursday, February 11, 2016 from 5-7 p.m. at the Naknek Native Village Council Building (Dollyâ€™s Hall) in Naknek.  We will be discussing compendium changes for 2016 and be available for other questions.
